name: short-links
title: Short Links
description: Show links and copies to clipboard
author: Tatu

commands.name: index
commands.title: Show Short Links
commands.description: Show links and copies to clipboard

commands.name: add-shortlink
commands.title: Add Short Links
commands.description: Add links to the total list

commands.name: edit-shortlink
commands.title: Edit Short Links
commands.description: Edit links to the total list

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
